alert.note: Alert for Osage; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:40PM CDT until May 26 at 6:02AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. Caney River near Ramona affecting Washington OK County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Sperry. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor rural flooding occurs from Skiatook to Turley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 23.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
